summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for the Butterfly Trust with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It outlines various account types, customer identification policies, and responsibilities regarding tax compliance and account management. The document includes signatures from individuals associated with the trust.

persons.name: Darren Indyker
persons.context: Darren Indyker is identified as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust, responsible for managing the trust's assets.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also mentioned as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust, indicating his role in overseeing the trust's operations.

connections.description: Both Darren Indyker and Richard Kahn are trustees of the Butterfly Trust, working together to manage the trust's assets.

keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for the Butterfly Trust with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Darren Indyker and Richard Kahn are identified as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
The application includes provisions for customer identification and compliance with anti-money laundering regulations.
The document emphasizes the responsibilities of account holders regarding tax obligations and regulatory reporting.
The account is associated with a location in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
